references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models which is the foundation of many subsequent diffusion-based image generation models.
This paper lays the theoretical groundwork for diffusion models, introducing the core concept of reversing a diffusion process to generate data.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the effectiveness of diffusion models for image generation, surpassing the quality of GANs and significantly advancing the field.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of text-guided diffusion models, enabling the generation of images based on textual descriptions, which is a major advancement in the field.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of the design space of diffusion models, helping to understand their strengths, weaknesses, and potential for improvement.
